[P1] Avoid async `forEach` when canceling reminders

`remindersToUpdate.forEach(async ...)` isn't awaited, so the mutation can return before cancellations/deletes complete, leaving scheduled reminders active. Use a `for...of` with `await` or `await Promise.all(remindersToUpdate.map(...))` to ensure completion.

[P1] Ensure cancelling reminders doesnâ€™t include NULL `referenceId`

This query can return cancelled reminders with `referenceId` NULL, but the loop sends `{ batch_id: reminder.referenceId }` to the email API; that will likely fail and prevent deleting those rows. Add `referenceId: { not: null }` (or branch like `if (!referenceId) delete row`) to avoid runtime/logic failures.
